review: Easy to use and bought cheap $25 :D
author: M. Rodriguez

review: If this thing could consistently put Netflix on my TV I would give it 5 stars. I spend more time troubleshooting issues than I do watching Netflix.I have to reset chromecast frequently, and usually multiple times.If chromecast does connect to my wifi network that doesn't necessarily mean that my Netflix app will recognize it.Too many issues to list.Buyer beware.
author: Tyler Tatlock

review: I like the chromecast but it isn't compatible with the music app on iphones or itunes so there's no way to just play your own music. Everything else is great
author: Turner Sheehan

review: I absolutely love my Chromecast!! I use it every day. I shouldn't have waited so long to get one.
author: Tania Staykova

review: Great product  I now have two of them
author: Cheryl  Mumford

review: Best gift EVER! if you want to give a cheap but nice gift, this is the best one you can buy!
